item.title: Engine Driven Hydraulic Pump Systems – Pump Deactivated

remarks.para: One engine pump system, including the pump and/or associated plumbing, may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: Demand pump for the associated hydraulic system remains ON, and

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: The Demand Pump Selector on the affected system must remain ON throughout flight.

placard.para: Placard adjacent to associated engine hydraulic pump switch: "INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.

note.para: The EDP deactivation/dispatch kit is P/N G29003-8.

numlitem.para: Deactivate the engine driven pump (EDP) per AMM 29-11-05/201 procedures.

note.para: This task removes the EDP from the engine, then the quillshaft from the EDP and installs a device to seal the gear shaft. The EDP is then reinstalled (which now will not operate) on the engine. This task also caps the pump fluid supply and pump case fittings along with the associated lines.

numlitem.para: If the affected EDP fluid supply or pump case drain lines are not functioning normally or are leaking, use the procedure below (step 2) to isolate the leak in the EDP hydraulic lines.
To deactivate the EDP hydraulic supply shutoff valve closed:

note.para: The hydraulic shutoff valve is installed in the strut. You must open the forward thrust reverser to strut mid fairing access door to gain access to the valve. You must remove approximately 50 screws to open the access door.

numlitem.para: Gain access to the hydraulic shutoff valve via the appropriate strut access panel/fairing.
Open the associated P6 panel engine fire extinguisher circuit breakers:
Engines 1 or 3: FIRE EXT ENG 1 & 3 BTL A and FIRE EXT ENG 1 & 3 BTL B
Engines 2 or 4: FIRE EXT ENG 2 & 4 BTL A and FIRE EXT ENG 2 & 4 BTL B
Pull the associated P5 Engine Fire Control panel Engine Fire handle.

note.para: You must push the fire override switch installed below the fire switch to operate the fire handle.

warning.para: DO NOT TURN THE FIRE HANDLE. THE EXTINGUISHER BOTTLES WILL LET THE CONTENTS OUT AND CAUSE DAMAGE TO THE ENGINE IF YOU TURN THE FIRE HANDLE.

numlitem.para: Verify the position indicator on the EDP hydraulic shutoff valve moves to the CLOSED position and the motor stops.
Open and collar the associated P7 panel HYDRAULICS EDP SUPPLY circuit breaker:
Push the fire handle back to its usual position.
Close the engine fire extinguisher circuit breakers opened above.
